citations.narrative:
The animal records did not include the date of acquisition for 3 turkeys or the dates of disposition for 93 chickens that
were acquired/transferred since the date of the last inspection.
Per this Section, exhibitors shall make and maintain complete records that include the date of purchase, acquisition, sale,
or disposal of the animal(s). This information is required to account for all animal transfers. The Licensee needs to update
these animal records to include the missing information and ensure that animal records have complete information going
forward. Correct by 10/29/24.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representative.
*END OF REPORT*
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1)(v) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The animal records did not include the date of acquisition for 3 turkeys or the dates of disposition for 93 chickens that 
were acquired/transferred since the date of the last inspection. 
 
Per this Section, exhibitors shall make and maintain complete records that include the date of purchase, acquisition, sale, 
or disposal of the animal(s). This information is required to account for all animal transfers. The Licensee needs to update 
these animal records to include the missing information and ensure that animal records have complete information going 
forward. Correct by 10/29/24. 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representative.  
 
*END OF REPORT* 
 
 n
